Name: Nonstop Assault
Obtained: Book of Mars, Book of Lulu, A Backstreets Fixer, Vol. Ⅱ, A Backstreets Fixer, Vol. Ⅰ, Streetlight Office

Name: The Will of the City
Effect: On Use Restore 3 Light; draw 1 page

Name: Unlock-Ⅲ
Effect: On Use Restore 1 Light and draw 1 page

Name: Fend This Off If You Can

Dices.Dice 0: blunt: 3~5 On Clash Win Lower max value of opponent’s next die by 3
Dices.Dice 1: pierce: 3~4 On Hit Inflict 2 Bleednext Scene

Obtained: Hook Office, Vol. Ⅰ, Book of Taein, Book of Naoki, Book of McCullin, Hook Office, Vol. Ⅱ

Name: The Will of the City
Effect: On Use Restore 3 Light; draw 1 page

Name: Unlock-Ⅲ
Effect: On Use Restore 1 Light and draw 1 page

Name: Le Regole
Effect: On Use All allies deal +2 damage with their Offensive dice next Scene

Name: The Red Notes
Effect: Combat Start Give 1 Strength to a random ally
Obtained: Book of The Musicians of Bremen, Book of Meow, Book of MuMu, Book of Oink

Name: Ingredient Hunt

Dices.Dice 0: slash: 2~6 On Hit Inflict 2 Bindnext Scene

Obtained: Book of Pierre, Book of Jack, A Guide to District 23, Dark Alleys of the Backstreets, Vol. Ⅰ
